title: 28  Reuben Haley, Ruba Rombic Vase, 1928/32
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">28  
Designed by Reuben Haley (American, 1872–1933)  
Made by Consolidated Lamp and Glass Company (American, 1893–1932)  
Ruba Rombic Vase  
1928/32  
Coraopolis, Pennsylvania  
Glass; 23.2 × 20.3 × 19.1 cm (9 1/8 × 8 × 7 1/2 in.)  
Raymond W. Garbe Fund in honor of Carl A. Erikson; Shirley and Anthony Sallas Fund, 2000.136

</section><section id="figures">Reuben Haley, Ruba Rombic Vase, 1928/32.
